itemDisplayName: Entra ZTNA Lab - 4 VM Base configuration (v1.0)
description: This template deploys a 4 VM base configuration, a base build for a variety of hybrid identity ZTNA test labs. This template provisions a Windows Server 2022, 2016, or 2022 Active Directory domain controller using the specified domain name, an application server running Windows Server 2012 R2 or 2016, and optionally a client VM running Windows 10.
summary: Deploys 4 VMs: 2016/19/22 AD DC, 2016/19/22 app server, 2016/19/22 App Proxy connector host, and optional Windows 10/11 client. Provisions an AD domain and joins member VMs.
